name: Chicken Spaghetti Bake
author: melissa
summary: A cheesy baked blend of chicken and spaghetti.
ingredients: 3 (12.5 fl oz) cans chicken chunks, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Drain and transfer pasta to a large bowl
Mix chicken, cream of mushroom soup, and cream of chicken soup into spaghetti
Transfer mixture to a 9x13-inch baking dish and top with Cheddar cheese
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted and sauce is bubbly, about 30 minutes
